title: Russia opens probe of Telegram chief, claiming app has been used for terrorism
summary_full: Russia is intensifying efforts to push users away from foreign messaging apps and toward a domestic platform that has been criticized as a surveillance tool.
summary_public: Russia is intensifying efforts to push users away from foreign messaging apps and toward a domestic platform that has been criticized as a surveillance tool.

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia opens probe of Telegram chief, claiming app has been used for terrorism
